notesStmt.note: Document includes transcribed cover letter and image of transaction statement ending June 30, 1903. View image of six-month financial statement for full display.

bibl.title: Cover letter and transaction statement ending June 30, 1903, Lincoln Land Company

msIdentifier.repository: McCracken Research Library, MS407 Bronson Rumsey Collection

div1.note:
Office of Lincoln Land Company
Rooms 33-36, 1241 O Street
Lincoln, Neb.
C. H. Morrill, President.
A. B. Minor, Sec'y and Treasurer.
Quotations of Prices Are Subject to Change without Notice.
div1.p: Dear Sir:- We hand you herewith the semi-annual statement of business transacted at Cody with respect to the half interest represented by yourself, as Trustee, which shows a net balance due your half interest of $1748.13, voucher and draft for which amount is also enclosed. Please sign and return the voucher, and oblige.
Statement of business transacted by the Lincoln Land Company at Cody, Wyoming, with respect to the one-half interest of Bronson Rumsey, Trustee, for the six months ending June 30 1903.
div1.note: [View image of page one of six-month financial statement ending June 30, 1903 for full display.]
[View image of page two of six-month financial statement ending June 30, 1903 for full display.]
div1.ab:
State of June 30. 1903
Lincoln Land Co.
check $1748.13 recd. & deposited July 13. 1903
